verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:11
verses.text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher, and an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:12
verses.text: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:13
verses.text: Hold fast the form of sound words, which thou hast heard of me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 1:14
verses.text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us.
